name: Zdzisław
overview: Zdzisław: Bohater Galaktyki is a sci-fi action adventure game with vector graphics. On the 4th of July an alien spacecraft stunned Zdzisław and kidnapped his girlfriend. In order to save her the player must fly through the galaxy, find and use useful items in proper places and sometimes prove his agility skills. The spacecraft has a limited number of fuel, replenished only on the Earth. Maneuvering off and landing requires great caution, too rapid flight may cause ship explosion - one of many ways of death. Death in the game means necessity to start all over again. Each planet is divided into a few single location with at least one occasion to die and one item to acquire.
